English:
The Behemoth harvests all the biomass it encounters on its path, showing particular predilection for human havens. Any haven visited by a Pandoran flyer that successfully returns to the Festering Skies will be targeted for harvesting by the Behemoth. Once the Behemoth has collected enough biomass, it will submerge in the ocean. It will emerge again at a different point, sometimes fielding stronger flyers. 

The Behemoth will submerge sooner if it is able to harvest havens or if its harvesting operations are disrupted. The Behemoth will gain Disruption Points (DP) when:
- a haven is harvested (1 DP)
- a Pandoran flyer is destroyed (1 DP if Charun, 2 DP if Berith, and 4 DP if Abaddon)
- a Node is destroyed (5 DP)

Once the Disruption Threshold is reached, the Behemoth will go back to the ocean.
French:
Le Béhémoth récolte toute la biomasse qu'il rencontre sur son chemin, montrant une prédilection particulière pour les refuges humains. Tout refuge visité par un aéronef pandorien qui réussit à retourner dans le ciel fétide sera ciblé pour être récolté par le Béhémoth. Une fois que le Béhémoth aura collecté suffisamment de biomasse, il s'immergera dans l'océan. Il en ressortira à un autre endroit, avec parfois des aéronefs plus puissants.

Le Béhémoth s'immergera plus tôt s'il est capable de récolter des refuges ou si ses opérations de récolte sont perturbées. Le Béhémoth gagne des points de perturbation (PD) lorsque :
- un refuge est récolté (1 PD)
- un pandorien volant est détruit (Charun : 1 PD, Berith : 2 PD, et Abaddon : 4 PD)
- un nœud de corruption est détruit (5 PD)

Une fois le seuil de perturbation atteint, le Béhémoth retourne dans l'océan.

English: The operatives who captured this creature claim that it is a former comrade, returned as a Pandoran monstrosity. We should examine it as soon as possible.
French: Les agents qui ont capturé cette créature prétendent que c'est un ancien camarade, revenu sous la forme d'une monstruosité pandorienne. Nous devrions l'examiner dès que possible.

English:
There is no room for doubt: this creature is, or used to be one of our operatives. What has been done to our friend and how... I would rather not try to imagine it. I wanted to hope that there was no shred of consciousness of the former self left in that monstrosity, but... I could swear it recognized me.

There is nothing we can do for our comrade now, and I'm afraid that killing it won't provide any release. We might encounter it again and again: the Pandorans splice and clone their victims ad infinitum.

We have to defeat the Pandoravirus once and for all. It's the only way to be sure.
French:
Il n'y a pas de place pour le doute : cette créature est, ou était, un de nos agents. Ce qui a été fait à notre ami et comment... Je préfère ne pas essayer de l'imaginer. Je voulais espérer qu'il ne restait aucune trace de conscience de l'ancienne personne dans cette monstruosité, mais... Je pourrais jurer qu'elle m'a reconnu.

Il n'y a rien que nous puissions faire pour notre camarade maintenant, et j'ai peur que le tuer ne nous libère en rien. Nous pourrions le rencontrer encore et encore : les Pandoriens dédoublent et clonent leurs victimes à l'infini.

Nous devons vaincre le Pandoravirus une fois pour toutes. C'est la seule façon d'être sûrs.

English: Killing or capturing Revenants may grant access to additional research
Project Osiris
French: Projet Osiris

English: Defeating Revenants in the field has brought us closer to understanding how they are created. We may yet harness this knowledge in the war for the future of our species.
French: Vaincre les Revenants sur le terrain nous a permis de mieux comprendre comment ils sont créés. Nous pouvons encore exploiter ces connaissances dans la guerre pour l'avenir de notre espèce.

English:
The Pandorans use the Oneiric Delirium to tap into our consciousness and partially replicate it. 

At first we assumed that they could only access information stored in our genes. However, subsequent encounters with Revenants demonstrated that they retained memories of their former lives. Furthermore, we have evidence that the act of remembering triggers an emotional response in them. 

All this leads us to conclude that the Oneiric Delirium taps into a variety of data streams or information centers of the infected. It's a process that we cannot even begin to understand, even as it puts into question our basic notions of consciousness. 

Nevertheless, we have managed to extract some practical applications from our research into Revenants. We believe we are  now capable of sometimes saving critically wounded operatives by giving them new, artificial bodies.
French:
Les Pandoriens utilisent le délire onirique pour puiser dans notre conscience et la répliquer partiellement.

Au début, nous avons supposé qu'ils ne pouvaient accéder qu'aux informations stockées dans nos gènes. Cependant, des rencontres ultérieures avec des Revenants ont démontré qu'ils conservaient des souvenirs de leurs vies antérieures. De plus, nous avons la preuve que l'acte de se souvenir déclenche une réponse émotionnelle chez eux.

Tout cela nous amène à conclure que le délire onirique puise dans une variété de flux de données ou de centres d'information des infectés. C'est un processus que nous ne pouvons même pas commencer à comprendre, même s'il remet en question nos notions de base de la conscience.

Néanmoins, nous avons réussi à extraire quelques applications pratiques de nos recherches sur les Revenants. Nous pensons que nous sommes maintenant capables de sauver parfois des agents gravement blessés en leur donnant de nouveaux corps artificiels.

"Kill confirmed. Phoenix, welco-  Team, on your toes, possible hostiles!"

"Don't shoot, we surrender! I'm Alistair Ashby. Yes, the "Mist Expert". Thanks for watching my content back in the day, I guess... 

A few of us managed to get to this bunker and activate the emergency beacon before we were overrun by the creatures that followed us here. 

We've got this place mostly up and running... Thanks to Olena, she is quite the wunderkind."
Alistair Ashby

"Oppa Alistair is good with people. I'm good with machines and software. This facility runs on a limited AI called Bennu. Once Bennu verifies your credentials as duly appointed Director, all functionality should be restored and you should be able to interface with the system."
Olena Kim

"Our planet is over 4.5 billion years old. Pre-collapse, no more than 3% of Earth's surface was urbanized. Dinosaurs lived on Earth for about 165 million years, going extinct some 65 million years ago. In a little over two centuries we found around 11,000 Dinosaur bones, which comes to one bone for every 15,000 years they spent on our planet. Do the math, Tobias... A million years from now someone might be proposing 'crackpot theories' suggesting that something like our civilization might have existed." - Dr Helena Lewandowski Over the past decades, the melting permafrost and the ecological changes wrought by the Pandoravirus have brought to the surface sites long hidden by sediment and water. With the help of Dr. Helena we have devised a scanner probe which can be produced in the Archaeology Facility. When launched from one of our aircraft, it can detect anomalies pointing to promising archaeological sites. Then, the hazardous process of exploration can begin.

Pre-Collapse there had been many attempts to find evidence of advanced precursor civilizations on Earth. Could those out-of-place artifacts have been real? What was behind the myths of Atlantis and of the Great Flood? If we want to learn the truth, we must pursue a more scientific approach.
An Unexpected Find
Director, I've come across something interesting in the archives of the recently activated base. Something called Project Glory... Perhaps we should get Bennu to analyze it.
Ancient Automata
We have retrieved the remains of the automata that we encountered at the site. We should analyze them immediately.

"What do their Automata tell us about the Ancients? Yes, they were far more technologically advanced than us, that's a given. But how different was their society from ours? These weaponized Automata tell us there was violence, there was fear. But what were they fighting, what did they fear?" - Alistair Ashby We encountered these entities during our exploration of the ancient site. This is the single most important archaeological discovery ever made! Our analysis concludes that these entities are inorganic and that they have been inactive for more than 1.8m years. The technology permitting the creation of such constructs is beyond our understanding; we are facing the artifacts of a civilization far in advance of our own. However, we have achieved two major breakthroughs in the course of our research into these creations: 1) We have gained new insight into the behavior and capabilities of the Ancient automata, which we will be able to leverage in the field from now on. 2) We have identified the type of materials from which they are made of, and are already theorizing on possible applications.
New information about Ancient Automata abilities available in tactical missions; Ancient Automata no longer immune to Daze effects from our weaponry
Exotic Materials
We have identified 3 distinct previously unknown substances in the composition of the Ancient Automata.

"Dr. Helena Lewandowski has claimed naming rights on the Exotic Materials on the basis that this an archaeological find. I want it to be a matter of record that this is the reason why, what is in fact an object in a previously unobserved state of matter, but vaguely reminiscent of Quark-gluon plasma, shall be confusingly known as 'Living Crystal'." - Dr. Rupert Everett-Bancroft The frames of the Ancient Automata are made of an extremely light and resistant alloy, dubbed “Orichalculm” by the Archaelogy department. Initial experimentation has further revealed that the alloy has the ability to change its conductivity properties in response to external stimuli. The Automata appear to draw electric power from a self-sustained and self-modulated miniaturized fusion reaction within a super-heated plasma compound: the “Living Crystal”. We need to secure and analyze an undamaged sample of this material. We have not found a device that would be turning the electric power generated by the Living Crystal into mechanical power; that is, we do not know how the Automata are able to move. This, taken with the fact that, according to the field report, the parts that make up the entity were suspended at a distance from each other, leads us to speculate on the presence of a third exotic material that is capable of nullifying gravity and providing motor function, a “Protean Mutane”. We are not capable of replicating these Exotic Materials, or even of providing any reasonable hypothesis as to where they could come from. However, we are confident that we can find practical applications if we are able to secure them in their unaltered form in sufficient quantities, and once we can examine samples of the Living Crystal and of the Protean Mutane.
This brings us a step closer to uncovering what happened to the Ancients and of using Exotic Materials for weapon research and development
The astrological charts were easy enough to extract, but we have to dig deeper into the data dump if we want to learn more.

Our analysis of the Antediluvian texts, combined with the knowledge gathered by the Phoenix Project over the course of the last century, has forced us to acknowledge a shocking truth: the war against Earth is being waged by an alien entity. This being of unimaginable age and power is located on Yuggoth, the ninth planet of our solar system.

Around 1.8 million years ago it planted a bioweapon on an asteroid on a collision trajectory with Earth: the Pandoravirus, intended to radically transform the Earth's ecosystem to the advantage of the Yuggothian Entity.

The Entity communicates with its creatures via some form of quasi-telepathic signal. Evidence suggests that some human beings are sensitive to these transmissions, explaining the occurrence of the name "Yuggoth" and variations thereof in the work of artists such as H.P. Lovecraft, Virginia Gutierrez, John Bellairs, Ralph Pabodie, and many others. This presumably represents an earlier, less powerful expression of the phenomenon we have termed Oneiric Delirium.

We have concluded that the ultimate purpose of the Entity is to create the ecological conditions that will allow it to come to Earth, and have hypothesized the existence of the Yuggothian Receptacle, a clone or replica to which the Entity will transfer its consciousness. We believe the Pandorans are already in the process of accumulating biomass and genetic material for this purpose.

Living Crystal Analysis
We have finally obtained an undamaged sample of the Living Crystal

"I have always known about the 'Ancients'. I have these memories of my parents talking about them when I was a child... They weren't just real, they were more real to them than everything else. And I have seen the 'Living Crystal' before. My dad kept a small notebook with brown leather covers. Every page was crammed with Hangul writing and sketches. The crystal stuck with me because dad joked that it would make my toys come alive." - Olena Kim Initial examination of an unaltered "Living Crystal" sample has revealed that it is capable of generating immense amounts of energy, potentially through an as-yet-unknown mechanism. Additionally, the material has the ability to store large amounts of information, similar to a computer memory. It appears to be able to process and manipulate this stored information in ways that are currently beyond our understanding. A lucky accident has revealed another extraordinary property of the "Living Crystal", as one of our researchers slipped in the lab and hit his head, receiving a severe brain injury, putting him in a coma. Since this incident, the rest of the research team has been seeing Dr. Rupert Everett-Bancroft's dreams while asleep! The crystal must be able to emit some form of signal or energy that interacts with the human brain, allowing the stored memories to seep into our consciousness while we sleep. It is hypothesized the crystal could be able to tap into a form of collective memory, where information is stored not just within the crystal itself but also in a larger, interconnected network of crystals.

Protean Mutane Analysis
We have finally secured a sample of the Protean Mutane

"Make no mistake: for the ancients, our ancestors were little more than curious animals. Perhaps they had laws to ensure our protection along with that of the other primates. Maybe they came from somewhere else and brought their own primordial soup with them… These are gods we are talking about, only they cleaned their roadside picnic pretty well when they left. Fortunately for us, we were able to grow without the burden of familiarity with our precursors' magic. Can you imagine how long it would have taken us to invent the lever had we been cursed with the power of "protean mutane" in our infancy?" - Alistair Ashby Protean Mutane possesses the extraordinary ability to manipulate gravitational forces, providing a powerful motor-like effect. The material is composed of a complex array of molecular structures, including a high concentration of exotic particles known as gravitons. These particles are believed to be responsible for mediating the gravitational force and have only been theorized to exist by physicists. Protean Mutane appears to harness the energy of these gravitons in a way that has yet to be fully understood. The material's structure also appears to be in a state of constant flux, hence its name is strikingly appropriate; "Protean" meaning able to change shape easily and "Mutane" meaning mutation.

Digitize my Dreams, the Cyclops Said

The plan worked, but we can only understand a tiny fraction of the information contained in the data dump. It is enough. Enough to overturn much of what we thought we knew and, critical to our current existential threat, of what we thought we knew about the Pandoravirus. 

It is ancient, yes; we suspected as much since the infection of our ecosystem began with the melting of the permafrost. But, thanks to the meticulous charts of our Solar system drawn up by the Ancients, we now know that the Pandoravirus didn’t originate on our planet: it arrived 1.8 million years ago on an asteroid that intersected the orbit of a “ninth planet” before it crashed into Earth.
